duties_responsibilities.duty: Create, maintain, and expand the company’s business systems for driving efficiency through technology projects.
Manage IT Administration, Project Management, and Application Management.
Identify, categorize, and implement technology projects to enhance and automate business processes.
Develop and manage project budgets and schedules.
Assist in optimizing the scope, benefits, and risks of proposed projects, and manage user and management expectations.
Leverage existing technology platforms to drive additional value.
Be the lead interface between departments to ensure stakeholder needs are met.
Surface and document department requirements, conduct interviews with project stakeholders, and present results.
Create and document operational interface instructions for business applications, test for operational readiness, and integrate data collection and reporting into the ERP system.
Maintain responsibility over key business applications and be the Subject Matter Expert in various business applications.
Train personnel on business applications and provide technical assistance and mentoring as needed.
Perform additional assignments as directed, including travel and field assignments.

education_certification.credential: 4-year College degree preferred, High school diploma or GED required
